details.description: Can contain more details on the error.

message.example: One or more fields are invalid.

domain.description: The domain of the error source.

metadata.description: Metadata contains more information. For bad requests this would be field information.

reason.description: The reason why the error occurs.

AvailabilityZone.description: Object that represents an availability zone.

BGPGatewayConfig.description: BGP configuration effects all connections. (only for routingMode=BGP_ROUTE_BASED)

enabled.description: This flag decides whether this connection should be enabled or disabled

localSubnets.description: Optional. Defaults to 0.0.0.0/0 for Route-based VPN configurations. Mandatory for Policy-based.

name.description:
The name of the connection. 
Maximum 20 characters (only alphanumeric and hyphens allowed). The name bust be unique within the parent Gateway. 
Currently renaming is not possible therefore deleting and re-creating the connection is necessary.

remoteSubnets.description: Optional. Defaults to 0.0.0.0/0 for Route-based VPN configurations. Mandatory for Policy-based.

enabled.description: This flag decides whether this connection should be enabled or disabled

localSubnets.description: Optional. Defaults to 0.0.0.0/0 for Route-based VPN configurations. Mandatory for Policy-based.

name.description:
The name of the connection. 
Maximum 20 characters (only alphanumeric and hyphens allowed). The name bust be unique within the parent Gateway. 
Currently renaming is not possible therefore deleting and re-creating the connection is necessary.

remoteSubnets.description: Optional. Defaults to 0.0.0.0/0 for Route-based VPN configurations. Mandatory for Policy-based.

name.description:
The name of the VPN gateway. 
Maximum 20 characters (only alphanumeric and hyphens allowed). Not changeable after creation.

planId.description:
Service Plan to configure the limits of the VPN. Currently supported plans are p50, p100, p200.
This list can change in the future where plan ids will be removed and new plans by added. That is the reason this is not an enum.

DefaultPlanId.description: Default Plan ID for the current region

name.description:
The name of the VPN gateway. 
Maximum 20 characters (only alphanumeric and hyphens allowed). Not changeable after creation.

planId.description:
Service Plan to configure the limits of the VPN. Currently supported plans are p50, p100, p200.
This list can change in the future where plan ids will be removed and new plans by added. That is the reason this is not an enum.

GatewayStatus.description: Describes the status of the surrounding infrastructure.

Label.description:
Map of custom labels. Key and values must be a string with max 63 chars, start/end with alphanumeric.
The key of a label follows the same rules as the LabelValue except that it cannot be empty.

LabelSelector.description: label selector object with no nested json objects.

LabelValue.description: Can be empty. If not empty, must start/end alphanumeric; may contain the characters ".", "-", "_" in between.

PeeringConfig.description:
The peering object defines the point-to-point IP configuration for the Tunnel Interface. 
These addresses serve as next-hop identifiers and are used for BGP peering sessions and can be used in Static Route-Based connectivity.

dhGroups.description: The Diffie-Hellman Group. Required, except if AEAD algorithms are selected.

maxBandwidth.description: Maximum bandwidth of a VPN instance.
maxBandwidth.title: VPN max supported throughput in Mbits.

maxConnections.description: Maximum concurrent connections of a VPN Gateway.
maxConnections.title: VPN max supported concurrent connections.

PrivateASN.description:
ASN for private use (reserved by IANA).
Allowed values are 64512-65534 (16-bit range) and 4200000000-4294967294 (32-bit range).

Region.description: The region in which the resource is located.

rekeyTime.description: Time to schedule a IKE re-keying (in seconds).

dpdAction.description:
Action to perform for this CHILD_SA on DPD timeout.
"clear": Closes the CHILD_SA and does not take further action.
"trap": installs a trap policy which will catch matching traffic and tries to re-negotiate the tunnel on-demand).
"restart": immediately tries to re-negotiate the CILD_SA under a fresh IKE_SA.

rekeyTime.description: Time to schedule a Child SA re-keying (in seconds).

startAction.description:
Action to perform after loading the connection configuration.
"none": The connection will be loaded but needs to be manually initiated.
"trap": installs a trap policy which triggers the tunnel as soon as matching traffic has been detected.
"start": initiates the connection actively.
"start|stop": Immediately initiate a connection for which trap policies have been installed.

preSharedKey.description:
A Pre-Shared Key for authentication. 
Required in create-requests, optional in update-requests and omitted in every response.

TunnelStatus.description: Describes the status of the VPN itself.

localSubnets.description: Optional. Defaults to 0.0.0.0/0 for Route-based VPN configurations. Mandatory for Policy-based.
